title: How to Run Need for Speed Carbon on Vista

steps.headline: Right click the Need For Speed: Carbon executable.
Check the box 'Run this program in compatibility mode for:'.

text: Right click the Need For Speed: Carbon executable.  Click 'Properties.'  Click the 'Compatibility' tab.  Check the box 'Run this program in compatibility mode for:'.  Select "Windows XP (Service Pack 2)"  Click 'Ok'.  Play the game.
